entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
